reviewText: these 3 movies are just awful, i was shocked to see how trashy, and shoddy, they all were. if you think for a moment that you'll be getting something from "Harvey Feirstein" FORGET ABOUT IT!!! these 3 are absolute pure gay sh--... if you want a real gay film with beautiful faces and an incredible plot then check this one out..... Longtime Companion...and this one is spectacular too...... Love! Valour! Compassion!...these 2 are amazing gay films, but the 3 your thinking of buying...FORGET ABOUT IT!!!!!!
